# 龙哥的StyledSweep使用说明

StyledSweep.exe Command Example:
StyledSweep.exe C:\Sem1Code\data\HC_rear\recursion_dev\static\ C:\Sem1Code\data\HC_rear\recursion_dev\recursions\01\ 100

transferAndchecker.py  stp转txt并check
Command Example:
python transferAndchecker.py C:\Sem1Code\data\HC_rear\recursion_dev\recursions\01\feature_line_from_ug_0.stp C:\Sem1Code\data\HC_rear\recursion_dev\recursions\01\feature_line_from_ug_1.stp
